1_15g93x35ge8mBSxf2ZDo1oiHdkD3JfSZUc.body: This is if it catches on. It's one thing to talk about how great it is, but we need to contribute as much as we can. Post lots of content. On top of that, we need to get all our techie friends in on it. All the nontechies too. They can't be afraid of this new technology. We much teach them to use it P2P, not through some of these centralized websites I see popping up. It is the mission of each and every one of us to take this seriously.
